mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_local_auth (user_id, username, password, create_time, last_edit_time) VALUES (#{personInfo.userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime})
mapper.select: SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time, l.user_id, p.user_id, p.name, p.gender, p.email, p.profile_img, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time, p.enable_status FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_person_info p ON l.user_id = p.user_id WHERE l.username = #{username} AND l.password = #{password}

SELECT l.local_auth_id, l.username, l.password, l.create_time, l.last_edit_time, l.user_id, p.user_id, p.name, p.gender, p.email, p.profile_img, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time, p.enable_status FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_person_info p ON l.user_id = p.user_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId}
